description:
Description


Covers traces for acne skin -Light adhesion at the moment of application -Slim elastomer tip -Contains skin moisturizing ingredients 
WEIGHTLESS & FULL COVERAGE: Our weightless concealer with exclusive blurring pigments provides dark circle diffusing illumination. A high coverage concealer, it imparts a subtle radiance as it conceals discolorations.
ALL DAY-STAYING POWER: HINCE second skin cover concealer is waterproof, sweatproof, and transfer-resistant that is perfect for summer and mask proof make up
FACE THE WORLD BEAUTIFULLY: Apply on your desired areas such as dark circles, redness, areas with skin trouble, and scars. The product doesn't crack or clump into wrinkles and fits like your own skin
1 SECOND FIXING: The Cross Polymer Powder formula that blends seamlessly to conceal uneven skin tone and minimize the appearance of pores in one second
YOUR NEW SECRET WEAPON: This concealer makeup that blurs imperfections, brightens, color corrects and contours for the ultimate flawless finish. A next-level perfection concealer that offers optimal coverage for perfect full face make up without thickness and lumps.

product_name: Colored Keyth Cream Touch Concealer Foundation (2 colors)
description:
Description


It provides soothing care while naturally covering blemishes, skin troubles, and redness.

*Peony flower extract: It reduces the expression of aging genes and has antioxidant effects, including anti-aging effects.

*Triple cica ingredient: Helps soothe skin irritation and restores skin condition.

It naturally covers blemishes, troubles, and redness and adheres gently to create smooth, natural-born skin.

Peony flower extract, known as a symbol of beauty and a noble flower of Asia, helps express an even and beautiful skin tone.

Peony flower extract has antioxidant properties, including anti-aging effects.

Triple Cica ingredient, made up of three types of CICA, soothes the skin and helps improve skin condition.

It is effective in covering dark circles and scars, and the creamy texture is light and smooth, just like your own skin, and evens out skin tone without clumping.

How To Use
01. After face makeup, apply to areas with flaws such as freckles or blemishes.
02. Tap the edges to create a borderless finish.

description:

- From skin blemishes cover to tone correcting, you can put it all in one palette and solve it all at once.

- You can customize it to fit your skin with a blending color that controls brightness and skin tone.

- It can be used as a high-adhesive cover texture for the perfect blemishes cover and as a moisturizing texture for the soft eyes.
- A collection of covers from cover to tone correction in one palette

- Personal Tone Cover Customized in Blendable Color

 - Multi-texture optimized by cover area

 - Melting adhesive cover that smooths smoothly without lifting

* Colors01 Clear Cover

No. 20~23 Natural cover for neutral & warm tone

- Green: Covering redness, redness, etc

- Medium Peach: Dark Circle Cover

- Vanilla: Covering blemishes

- Beige: blemish cover & shading

- Pure Bright: Blending & Highlighting



02 Pure Cover

It's a bright color without yellow color and a white cover for bright skin tones over No. 19

- Lavender Fog: Dull & Yellow Cover

- Porcelain: Covering blemishes

Light - blemishes & contour covers

Light - blemishes & contour covers

description:
Description

- A buildable, light-to-medium coverage, creaseless concealer that has a light-as-air feel.
- This light-to-medium coverage, liquid formula melts into skin, filtering out the look of blemishes, dark circles, and more—without caking or creasing—for a natural-looking finish.
- Light-fix technology provides maximum coverage with an ultra-lightweight feel.

Options Available:
#02 Banana Milk - Fair with netural to yellow undertones
#04 Waffles - Light with yellow undertones
#05 Fortune Cookie - Medium with neutral-to-yellow undertones
#06 Boba Tea - Medium with neutral undertones
#07 Sweet Toast - Medium with yellow undertones
#08 Candied Ginger - Medium-to-deep with neutral undertones
How To Use
Apply directly onto skin and blend out with fingers.
TIP: Great as an eyeshadow base or around the mouth area to prep for lip product application.

original_name: [JAVIN DE SEOUL] Wink Liquid Concealer (5 Colors)

description:
Description

-Neither heavy nor thick due to the aqua peeling system, it naturally stays in place! 
-Stays in place with highly adhesive and tight coverage! Long-lasting cover concealer perfect for sensitive skin. 
-Dense and firm coverage against skin impurities with double powder containing a mixture of different particles!. 
-It can be used in various ways such as covering up dark circles and skin flaws (zits) as well as a lip base depending on your skin concerns!.

Suggested Use

Apply a small amount on skin, then tap with fingers to blend.
Key Ingredients
Water, Titanium Dioxide, Cyclopentasiloxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Talc, PVP, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Iron Oxide (CI 77492), Butylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Barium Sulfate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Aluminum Hydroxide, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Iron Oxide (CI 77491), Polysilicone-11, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Iron Oxide (CI 77499), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Disodium EDTA, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Squalane, Myristic Acid, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Fruit Extract, Brassica Oleracea Gemmifera (Brussels Sprouts) Extract, Lecithin, Madecassoside, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Leaf Extract, Leontopodium Alpinum Extract, Alcohol, Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Seed, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ascorbic Acid, Tromethamine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Beta-Glucan, Ceramide NP, Sodium Sulfite, Dunaliella Salina Extract
